Code¶

class pyLbInv.ControlClass¶

Methods to read Tindie file. Tindie file has board sales history

mapTindieInList(header)¶
Parameters:header – The list header.
Returns:a mapping file with the columns mapped to a column number.

Map the column headers to an internal preferred ordering. Latest input format - * Order ID * Date * First Name * Last Name * Email * Street * City * State / Province * Postal/Zip Code * Country * Additional Instructions * Phone * Refunded * Shipped * Pay Out Status * Paid Out * Shipping * Shipping Amount * Tracking Number * Tindie Fee * Processing Fee * Product Name * Option Summary * Status * Quantity * Unit Price * Total Price * Model Number
